subject: Re: [junit] jfcunit - Help Required !!
msgSnippet: ... JFCUnit is not an Eclipse plugin. It is an extension to JUnit. ... Put the JFCUnit JAR files on the class path when you compile and run your tests. -- J.
messageBody:
yochana_h wrote:

> Can anyone tell me the steps to plugin jfcunit with Eclipse and also
> let me know how to run a sample testcase using jfcunit and Eclipse.

JFCUnit is not an Eclipse plugin. It is an extension to JUnit.

> I downloaded jfcunit zip file and tried placing it in Eclipse plugin
> directory but I cld not see the jfcunit update in Eclipse when I
> restarted the Eclipse.

Put the JFCUnit JAR files on the class path when you compile and run
your tests.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
